brand.name: Catalog Studio
brand.tagline: Modern digital menus for restaurants. Update instantly, share everywhere.

meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Discover the story behind Catalog Studio and our mission to transform restaurant menus.

hero.title: Transforming how restaurants showcase their menus
hero.subtitle: We created Catalog Studio to give restaurants the power to present their cuisine in the best possible way - without the technical headaches.

problem.title: The Challenge
problem.description: The restaurant industry moves fast. Customers expect seamless digital experiences, and competition is fiercer than ever. Printed menus are expensive to update, QR codes often lead to ugly PDFs, and complex platforms eat up your valuable time.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: We built a platform that lets you create a professional digital menu in minutes and update it instantly from anywhere. We don't replace the traditional experience ‚Äì we enhance it. Your customers get a beautiful showcase of your cuisine, while you gain complete control and save time and money.

vision.title: The Vision
vision.description: We envision a future where every restaurant, from food trucks to fine dining, has the tools to stay competitive in the digital age ‚Äì without sacrificing the charm and authenticity of the traditional dining experience.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Technology should be intuitive. We build tools anyone can use, without steep learning curves or complicated manuals.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Your time is valuable. Our platform is built for speed - from initial setup to daily menu updates.

beauty.title: Beauty
beauty.description: Your menu deserves to look great. We provide beautifully designed, professional templates that make your food stand out.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Your customers depend on your menu. We build rock-solid infrastructure that works 24/7, so you don't have to worry.

tech.title: Built with modern technology
tech.subtitle: We use the best tools to deliver a fast, secure, and scalable experience.

nextjs.name: Next.js 15
nextjs.description: React framework for lightning-fast web applications

supabase.name: Supabase
supabase.description: Secure backend with real-time authentication and storage

vercel.name: Vercel
vercel.description: Global hosting with top-tier performance and 99.9% uptime

switch.question: Can I switch plans later?
switch.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

limit.question: What happens when I reach my product limit?
limit.answer: You'll be notified when you're approaching your limit. You can either upgrade to a higher plan or remove some products to stay within your current limit.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment, no questions asked.

domain.question: Can I use my own domain?
domain.answer: Yes! Basic and Premium plans include custom domain support. You can connect your own domain (e.g., menu.yourrestaurant.com).

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and process payments securely through Stripe.

setup.question: Is there a setup fee?
setup.answer: No setup fees, ever. You only pay the monthly or annual subscription price for your chosen plan.

cta.title: Ready to transform your menu?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of restaurants creating beautiful digital menus with Catalog Studio
cta.trial: No credit card required ¬∑ Cancel anytime ¬∑ 14-day money-back guarantee

hero.title: We're here to help
hero.subtitle: Have a question or need assistance? Our team is ready to help you succeed with Catalog Studio.

methods.title: Choose your preferred way to reach us
methods.subtitle: We're available through multiple channels to provide you the best support experience

email.title: Email Us
email.description: For detailed inquiries and support requests

responseTime.title: Fast response time
responseTime.description: We typically respond within 2-4 hours during business hours (Mon-Fri, 9AM-6PM EET)

form.title: Drop us a line

form.cardDescription: We'll respond to your message within 24 hours

faq.title: Common questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to frequently asked questions

sales.question: How can I speak to sales?
sales.answer: Email us at hello@catalogstudio.com or call +40 123 456 789. Our sales team is available Monday-Friday, 9AM-6PM EET.

support.question: What support options are available?
support.answer: All plans include email support. Basic and Premium plans get priority support with faster response times. We also have extensive documentation and video tutorials.

demo.question: Can I schedule a demo?
demo.answer: Absolutely! Contact us via email or phone to schedule a personalized demo. We'll show you how Catalog Studio can work for your restaurant.

pricing.question: Have questions about pricing?
pricing.answer: Check out our pricing page for detailed plan information. For custom enterprise solutions or volume discounts, contact our sales team.
